briefTitle: 89Zr-TLX250 for PET/CT Imaging of ccRCC- ZIRCON Study
officialTitle: A Confirmatory, Prospective, Open-label, Multi-centre Phase 3 Study to Evaluate Diagnostic Performance of Zirconium-labelled Girentuximab to Non-invasively Detect ccRCC by PET/CT Imaging in Patients With Indeterminate Renal Masses
summary: 89Zr-TLX250 is under clinical development as a diagnostic agent targeting clear cell renal cell carcinoma.

primaryOutcome.measure: Sensitivity and Specificity of Qualitative Assessment of PET/CT Imaging With 89Zr-TLX250 to Noninvasively Detect ccRCC in Patients With Indeterminate Renal Masses, Using Histology as Standard of Truth.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Diagnostic PET/CT scan on Day 5 ± 2 days post 89Zr-TLX250 administration. Histological confirmation of the material from nephrectomy conducted within 90 days post 89Zr-TLX250 administration served as standard of truth.
